name: COTY
bossPosition: Executive Vice President & Chief Financial Officer, President of S.A.S
membership: Active Corporate Member of Cosmetics Europe, and of a majority of cosmetic industry associations at national level in the European Union.
goal: Driven by passion, creative freedom, and an entrepreneurial spirit, COTY has built a unique portfolio of beauty brands that have produced some of the strongest consumer franchises in history.
interests: Communication, Consumer Affairs, Environment, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
Cosmetic Products Regulation (EC) No 1223/2009, and all amendments thereto.
Regulation (EC) No 1272/2008 on the classification, labelling and packaging of substances and mixtures (CLP Regulation), and the classification thereunder of substances used in cosmetic products.
Interinstitutional Agreement on Better Law-making.
